instruction: Bring the chicken to the room temperature and pat dry the chicken with a paper towel
Mix 1 teaspoon of kosher salt, 1 teaspoon of garlic powder, 1 teaspoon of smoked paprika, 1 spoon of onion powder, half teaspoon of ground black pepper
Sprinkle the mixture all over the chicken
Cook the chicken in the grill for 35 minutes
